comments:
Description:
NPE when preview sample report test.rptdesign
Build number:2.3.0.v20071207

Steps to reproduce:
1. Get sample report test.rptdesign from birt runtime package.
2. Preview it.

Expected result:
Display report content without exception.

Actual result:
Fail to preview with NPE.
